predicate.note: Frames file for 'scud' based on sentences in brown corpus. Comparison with 'walk.' No VerbNet entry.

example.name: intransitive
example.text: She remembered , suddenly , a night of savage moonlight and scudding clouds when she and Adelia , [*-1] having dared each other , had stolen out of their great safe house and come here , hand in hand , [*-1] hoping and fearing ghosts [*T*-2] .
